__e: Yo, you remember when we used to sit on the top of 734 building, man... looking at the city, used to talk about what we gonna do?
Anyone who's done time can get back on his feet, no matter what he's done.
You tell people that you've done time, and they have a bad way of looking at you.
You sat in the car and you said you'd never go.
We've sat outside all night long waiting to hold him, and now you're telling us that we have to wait longer?
I did two years hard time and I'm not going back in.
You know, from where I'm sitting, it looked like...
After two weeks spent sitting at his bedside, thinking he could die, he says he's gotta get away.

And when it's done, and it will be done... you and I are gonna meet back here at this restaurant... at this same table that I used to share with my boy... and I'm gonna look you in the eyes, just like you're looking me in the eyes right now... and I'm gonna see how empty they are... without your son in the world.
When you were sitting on the floor with your mother,what did she say to you?
But when I met you, I wanted to know more, but I...
It would have been 20, but the car you were in was stolen.
Just because he's bad doesn't mean he's been busted.
I think it's about time a woman sat here.
Come on over here and sit where your ma used to sit.
Yes, I was sitting here when the call came through.
If you never picked me up, I would have seen her. I wouldn't be riding around in that truck while she was dying.
You know? I used to sit right here when I was a little girl.
